text: New mom Khloe Kardashian is not playing with any internet trolls when it comes to her baby girl True Thompson! The reality star recently clapped back at a troll on Twitter who said baby True is “ Not Cute ”. RELATED : Khloe Kardashian ‘ Very Anxious ’ To Leave Daughter True Thompson For Work According to ENews, the 33 - year - old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star fired back at a Twitter troll on Friday after they commented on her 2 and 1 / 2 - month - old daughter ’ s appearance. “ Is it just me or is @ khloekardashdian baby, True, not cute at all? ” the Twitter user wrote. But Khloe was not about to let such a hateful comment slide. “
